pages.text: Piglins are smarter, in this pack!$(br2)Sapience adds a few differences to piglin behavior.$(br)For one, there is a reputation system.$(br2)If you barter or do something for piglins, they like you more and let you mine gold or grab stuff from chests.

Very high reputation, can even make them fight with your, or allow you to walk among them, without gold armor.$(br2)On the other hoof, if you hurt them or do other things, they don't like, your reputation decreases.$(br)Which can even lead to them attacking you, while wearing gold armor.$(br)At least they won't barter with you, if they hate you. (But this takes some doing)
Bartering is also different. Piglins accept gold nuggets too.$(br)This will increase your chance for common loot, but also reduces stack size, of what you get, by half.

Bartering with gold ingots is unchanged. Loot and quantities are the same as in vanilla. But piglins craft armor from ingots, they receive, and put it on.$(br)They also share crafted armor with others.
Gold blocks drastically increase the chance for rare loot and double the stack size you get. They are also broken down to ingot and piglins make armor from them.
